trans-unit.source: Obtains the file locations and descriptions of ASP.NET Web services.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os locais de arquivo e descrições dos serviços Web do ASP.NET.
Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractSearchPattern> class inherits from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoverySearchPattern> class and is employed by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler> class's <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method, which handles an HTTP request for a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractSearchPattern> classe herda da <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoverySearchPattern> classe e empregado pelo <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler> da classe <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> método, que manipula uma solicitação HTTP para um documento de descoberta.

trans-unit.source: Normally, none of these classes need to be used directly by a developer.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, nenhuma dessas classes precisa ser usada diretamente por um desenvolvedor.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractSearchPattern" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractSearchPattern" />.

trans-unit.source: The file-system path of the Web service's .asmx file.
trans-unit.target: O caminho do sistema de arquivos do arquivo .asmx do serviço Web.

trans-unit.source: Creates the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference" /> object for the specified .asmx file.
trans-unit.target: Cria o objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference" /> para o arquivo .asmx especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference" /> object with the specified file name for its .asmx file.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference" /> com o nome de arquivo especificado para seu arquivo .asmx.

trans-unit.source: The concrete <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference> class inherits from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference> class.
trans-unit.target: O concreto <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference> classe herda da <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference> instance contains the location of the .asmx file and the corresponding Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document, which can be dynamically obtained by appending a wsdl query string to the .asmx file path.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference> instância contém o local do arquivo. asmx e o documento WSDL Web Services Description Language () correspondente, que pode ser obtido dinamicamente anexando uma cadeia de caracteres de consulta de wsdl para o caminho do arquivo. asmx.

trans-unit.source: Gets the file name pattern to use as a search target.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de nome de arquivo a ser usado como um destino de pesquisa.
A cadeia de caracteres literal "*. asmx".

trans-unit.source: The pattern "*.asmx" indicates an ASP.NET Web service file extension.
trans-unit.target: O padrão "*. asmx" indica uma extensão de arquivo do serviço da Web do ASP.NET.
